Translations.Text: Watee Neumeuhei uleh Po gata b4 Tajak hai Musa keudeh talangkah 4 Kaom nyang lalem kaphe keu Tuhan
Kaom Peuraʻeun nyang that seurakah Pakon bandum jih han jitakwa
Geukheun le Musa wahe ya Allah Lon takot sulet jipeugah keu lon Han jipateh lon jikheun beurakah
Seumpet dada lon han glah lidah lon Neukirem Harun lom Neuyue peugah
Dilon na salah pih bak awak nyan Takot jipoh lon jimeung tueng balah
Neukheun hana peue tajak bandua Ò Kamoe bri tanda nyang raya tuah Kamoe Meudeungo peue-peue nyang jikheun
Ubak Peuraʻeun keudeh tapeugah Kamoe nyoe Rasul Tuhan Po alam
Awak kamoe nyan Neuyue peuleupah Bani Israil tajok keu kamoe
Jiseuot meunoe laju jipeugah Kon gata dilee kamoe peulahra Yoh mantong gata si manyak mirah Padum thon sabe taduek ngon kamoe
Tapeubuet dudoe buet nyang that salah oi Dum guna kamoe hana tapike Tatem jak kaphe hana tapeugah
Geukheun buet lon nyan sabab meularat Watee nyan sisat lon ka roh salah
Nyankeuh jeuet lon plueng keudeh u lua Takot keu gata tameung tueng balah Teuma di sideh Tuhan bri keu lon Hikmah keu lon Neubri got leupah Neupeujeuet treuk lon keu Rasul Tuhan
Teuma nikmat nyan nyang gata peugah Tapeulahra lon yoh mantong ubit Ka tapeunamiet dum hamba Allah Bani Israil dum tapeunamiet Lalem that keubit elanya leupah
Peuraʻeun tanyong boh nyang toh Tuhan Nyang Po dum alam bunoe tapeugah
Geukheun Tuhan Po langet ngon bumoe Ngon bandum asoe bandum blah bicah Meu tatem pateh nyankeuh nyang Tuhan
Peuraʻeun jikheun bak ngon jih bagah Nyan na tadeungo roe gata bandum
Musa kheun Tuhan kuasa leupah Tuhan gata dum ngon yah-yah gata Nyang dilee masa dum ka beh leupah
Jikheun Rasul nyan nyang jak bak gata Jih nyan ka gila akai ka ubah
Geukheun Tuhan Po timu ngon barat Bandum lat batat peuneujeuet Allah Meunyo tapike ngon akai nyang got
Jikheun bek le that haba tapeugah Meu takheun tuhan laen nibak lon Gata lam palong keudeh kukeubah Dalam glap seupot kupasoe gata
Teuma kheun Musa deungo lon peugah Meunyo ek lon bri dali nyang nyata Teuma peue gata tatem meunyeurah
Jikheun jok keunoe dali bak gata Meunyo bit beuna lagee tapeugah
Geutiek treuk tungkat ka jeuet keu naga Uleue be raya nyata that leupah
Geusuet ngon jaroe puteh meukeuprak Soe nyang ngieng rusak mata jih mirah
